website_summaries.verdict: A hypoallergenic sunscreen designed for sensitive skin.
pros: This 24.5% zinc product is all natural and contains no chemicals that are toxic to coral reefs or marine ecosystems
Its natural formula is perfect for those with sensitive skin or eczema as well
Rated for SPF 50 protection and water resistance for up to 80 minutes
cons: High zinc content results in a heavy solution that can be hard to squeeze out of the bottle

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell and feel!
customer_reviews.text: Sunblocz Baby & Kids is 100% natural, it is not oily, and it smells INCREDIBLE! ❤️ I love that it is safe for babies, and older, there are so many additives in other sunscreens, I hate applying them. It is water resistant, hypoallergenic, and great for sensitive skin. 🙌 Bonus is that it acts as a bug repellant, AND it will not sting eyes, if your kids get it in them from rubbing their eyes or something. 👍 When you apply it to your skin, you don't even feel it! I love that you don't get that yucky layer of suncreen slime. Definitely recommend it! It's worth it. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard to find a good natural sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find a good natural sunscreen. Sun Blocz does a great job keeping my family from burning. My son was outside in the sun and didn’t even so much as get pink when I used this sunscreen. I did make sure and apply every 2 hours. This sunscreen has a very nice light scent that quickly goes away after it is applied. It is a bit thick but goes on nicely. Like most natural sunscreen it does leave a light white tint on the skin. But does eventually goes away and isn’t too noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Gertrude

customer_reviews.title: Great water resistant sunblock!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I think this is a must have for all babies and kids especially in the summer and going into the pool. The lotion does go on thick but I found that if you spread it in your hands first it goes on easily. Its actually easier than most sunblocks. I also really like the smell. It smells like lavender which is my favorite. My toddler seems to like it too and didn't complain when I put it on. He actually wanted to do it himself. I also tried the product just to make sure and it is definitely parent approved.
customer_reviews.author: S L

customer_reviews.title: So Far so Good
customer_reviews.text: We've only used it once so far. My daughter has very sensitive skin prone to heat rashes, so finding a sunscreen that works for her is important. The one day we used it, she didn't break out or get burned. We were surprised by the lavender scent. I wish it was lightly tinted since it does leave a noticeable white tint behind till it is fully absorbed. I'm excited that it is supposed to repel bugs. I intend to send it with my daughter to summer camp.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Great product I'm proud to use
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this sunscreen and all the it offers. Zinc Oxide is exactly what I look for in a sunscreen to protect my babies. Love that it does not have any of the things I try to avoid like Parabens. An added bonus is that it is reef safe so I know we aren't leaving our footprint when we swim in the ocean. I would buy this again and use it on my entire family!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Klein

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We got to try olenbabykids sunblocz natural sunscreen and I love it! It's safe for my sensitive kiddos and even has a repellent in it to help with bugs- which is great in Nebraska! It is thick and easy to rub in and I know getting the job done and keeping them protected for our every day activities.
customer_reviews.author: Brittni W.

customer_reviews.title: I like that this is all natural and the high SPF
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is all natural and the high SPF. Unfortunately, we found it to be really greasy, and I personally am not a fan of the lavender/rosemary smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amadon1

customer_reviews.title: Great natural sunscreen, good for babies and kids
customer_reviews.text: Got to try out Sunblocz Baby and kids natural sunscreen spf 50. Today was a great day to use it because it finally was a beautiful, sunny day and we took advantage of it. I really like this sunscreen because I can use it for both of my kiddos. It’s 100% natural, mineral sunscreen and contains zinc oxide. It went on smooth and rubbed in well. It had a pleasant smell and neither of my children fussed over having to wear it. We were outside most of the day and both kids were safe from the sun. I think this is a great sunscreen and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Wexler

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product, love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen! I have sensitive skin and like to avoid chemicals so I always look for "babies" sunscreen. This stuff is the bomb. It smells good, feels good on (no irritation etc) and seems to be very effective protection (I use it daily for swimming on my face in Australian sun). It is thick, but you can always open the tube to get out the rest :) You need to use soap to wash it off (water proof) and it does make me look a little paler- but I like this effect. Buy it, you won't regret it :)
customer_reviews.author: Gwynneth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection for my water babies
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It’s not too thick like some of the other similar sunscreens I have seen out there. Smells great, goes on smooth (make sure you knead the tube a bit before applying). My kiddos are water babies! They love swimming in the Arizona sun. This offered great protection!
customer_reviews.author: Blahblahblahhh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect All-Natural Sunscreen for my Toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunblock for my 3 year old son. We spend LOTS of time outdoors year-round and I always try to play it safe with sunscreen. I'm thankful this is all-natural and I can use it sparingly. A small amount goes a long way and it seeps into the skin nicely. Perfect for my little guy!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Meg

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND - It Stays on!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used multiple "natural" sunscreens and they wash off the min my kids hit the water. Not so with sunblocz it sated on and we did not have to reapply. Has a nice clean scent.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: this sunscreen smells wonderful. It has moisturizing components that are all natural such as grape seed oil. It has a citrus smell, and goes on with a nice coat of coverage. Living in Florida, we use sunscreen a lot. This is the highest level of zinc oxide I've been able to find in a sunscreen. After attending a melanoma walk, I learned this is a very important ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hans

customer_reviews.title: Natural and works great
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a sunscreen that works and is safe to use on your little ones, this one is my favorite. It even has a pleasant natural smell unlike many of the other "child-safe" sunscreens that are full of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa N

customer_reviews.title: Love Sunblocz! It's an effective sunscreen without all those ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Sunblocz! It's an effective sunscreen without all those harsh chemicals. Very light, and not greasy. My kids prefer to use this one over others we have tried in the past. Great product and I will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria T

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy. You have to rub it in ...
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy. You have to rub it in. It does stay on even after swimming. A bit of the white-face look but that's the price of a natural mineral sunscreen
customer_reviews.author: eagle eyes

customer_reviews.title: A good sunscreen with natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing to me about this sunscreen is the natural ingredients. Both of my children have sensitive skin so I look for a sunscreen that is natural. In the past, they developed terrible rashes to a popular brand sunscreen. This sunscreen also has pleasant scent and has seemed effective so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product in the aspects of it not giving my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product in the aspects of it not giving my little one a rash and protecting her from the sun....THOUGH the cream is thick and hard to massage in which is only a problem when trying to apply it on my little ones face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sun block is too hard to squeeze out of the tube
customer_reviews.text: I used this sun block for the first time this weekend, and the sunscreen has hardened into a rock. Maybe it's because the tube was lying in the hot sun. Regardless, even after kneading the tube, per the directions, the sun block is still very hard and almost impossible to squeeze out of the tube without applying considerable pressure. I've asked Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: MGL

customer_reviews.title: A great natural sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! We used it all weekend while we were in and out of the water in 100 degree heat. I even used it myself. This is easy to use and I love that it’s all natural, has a ewg rating of 1, and has a nice smell with a little lavender and rosemary. With out all summer, park, biking, and beach obsessed kids, this is a product I can get behind.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: relatively easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Effective, smells pleasant, no irritation, relatively easy to apply. Only minor con is that you have to massage the tube a bit to get it to come out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: This product didn't work for me. 1) It stained ...
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work for me. 1) It stained my clothes. 2) It's tough to get the sunscreen out of the tube. 3) It's so thick that it's hard to spread and I look very white after.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Jordan Yaokasin, CFA

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, nice smelling, kid-safe sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I like that this sunscreen is kid-safe and doesn't have a typical "sunscreen" smell. It also is waterproof, which seems to help it last longer. There's a sticker on the tube indicating to "knead tube before use" - even after doing this it came out a little separated/oily, which I didn't enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Steph091209

customer_reviews.title: Best sunblock to use
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is all natural, very safe for my sons sensitive skin and it works great in the Florida sun! Alittle goes along way with this sunblock and I will get plenty of uses out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Sunburned
customer_reviews.text: I used this lotion the first day in Hawaii and all the family was sunburned after a 4 hours Exposure, Reapplying the cream Once. I would not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Marialuisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and my daughter needs sun protection during playtime at school. This product is great!! Love how lasting it is and feel better applying an organic product vs store bought UV protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% Natural Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Finally a 100% natural suncreen. I never researched sunscreen before becoming a mom and then became so overwhelmed after learning more about it. I’m thankful and confident in the ingredients to keep my baby safe and protected.
customer_reviews.author: jfignewton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all natural sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic all natural sunscreen! Doesn't irritate my son's and I feel safe putting it on. Glad to finally have a great sunscreen for my boys!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin Apporved!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sunscreen for my nephew who was born on Nov 4th. I looked very carefully to buy sunscreen that I could depend on being made with sensitive skin in mind. So far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: EM's Outlet

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to get out of tube.
customer_reviews.text: Although I am confident that this product works well as a sun block, I wouldn't recommend it in a tube. We literally had to step on it to get the thick sun block out of the tube. It went on very thick, but because of this was hard to spread on my baby's skin to insure everything was covered.
customer_reviews.author: Mi Webber

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell
customer_reviews.text: It's a good natural sunscreen but a little pricey. Also it has a essential oil smell that we like but my daughter did not.
customer_reviews.author: jinxrl

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Goes on well and kept the sun away :) my only dislike is that it leaves a white residue but all the zinc based sunscreens I have tried do. Great SAFE product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin F.

customer_reviews.title: Causes burns
customer_reviews.text: Caused my son a chemical burn all over his face neck n ears for days dont recommend anyone buy this its thick n hard to wash off as well
customer_reviews.author: kathleen dickinson

customer_reviews.title: ... on several full day beach days and it's been great. She isn't a fan of clothing at the ...
customer_reviews.text: We have used this sunblock for our toddler on several full day beach days and it's been great. She isn't a fan of clothing at the beach, so full coverage is key. The sunscreen is a bit thick, so not super easy to put on, but my daughter actually likes it. I also like that it's pretty white, so you can tell if you've missed any spot.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Tubis

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: I come back to Sun Bum time and again, it smells heavenly, absorbs nicely and stays on. The only choice is UV level which depends on the day
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like anything natural. Goes on very milky; but once rubbed in well, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: LKW

customer_reviews.title: very good sunscreen love that doesn't have harmful chemicals it leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: very good sunscreen love that doesn't have harmful chemicals it leaves white marks on skin but it does its job :)
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Gatchell

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again or recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I dont like this product. I will use the bottle because I paid so much for it but I would not buy again or recommend it. I bought it for myself. The formula is VERY THICK. It is NOT easy to spread which makes me pull my skin this way and that. The sunblock leaves a WHITE finish so its not very compatible with make up. The SMELL is not so great. I cant wait to finish up the bottle so I could try out another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chung

customer_reviews.title: Loved this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Loved this sunscreen! Used it for all of my kids on a hot day this past weekend and it worked well and stayed put during my son's soccer game. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Creamy consistency easy to rub in!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Smells wonderful and rubbed in easily! My girls were protected all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Lynleek72311

customer_reviews.title: I love knowing that my kids are getting protected from sunburns ...
customer_reviews.text: This Sunblock is the real deal! It is thick with zinc oxide and a little goes a long way! I love knowing that my kids are getting protected from sunburns without the harsh chemicals in most sunblocks.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: One of my kids’ favorite outdoor play areas gets a ton of sun. I tried out this 100% natural sunscreen by OlenBabyKids and had no burns on my babes.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Super white and hard to rub in
customer_reviews.text: This product is super hard to rub in and stays white on my son's skin. Very greasy as well.
customer_reviews.author: JCBelmont

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: I love how this goes on. So easy when you have a little one squirming around! Plus you have the added benefit of knowing it is made with all natural products, so no harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: SPF Kids sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: In California it is 'sunscreen wearing time' year round. Having a high SPF and one safe for skin is important to me for myself and my kids. Love that this is SPF 50. It is waterproof so great for sports and outdoor activities. Lasts a long time too without having to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: deborah d

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny to protect my children!
customer_reviews.text: Living in AZ, it is absolutely critical that we protect our skin from the harsh rays of the sun on a daily basis from very early on in life. As someone who has had basal cell skin cancer removed in my early 30s, you better bet I am always looking for ways to protect my two young children from the same concerns. Sunblocz Baby+Kids goes on easily and protects without all of the scary harsh chemicals that some other sunblocks contain. It is worth the extra pennies spent for the infinite amount of peace of mind gained.
customer_reviews.author: UAJessie

customer_reviews.title: Such great sunblock!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so great! We were just recently in Hawaii and we had our 4 year old and 4 month old daughters with us. I hate using any sunblock on them because of all the chemicals, especially because my youngest daughter was so young! I asked the pediatrician and he said as long as it is Zinc. Well this stuff was awesome!! It protected them so well and helped ease my nervousness about my youngest getting burnt! I was able to relax and enjoy! It is a little thick and sticks to your hands more, but it's totally worth it for peace of mind! Plus, I prefer natural stuff anyway! I even used it for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smell, great coverage & protection
customer_reviews.text: I exclusively use all natural sunscreen on my children and have tried everything out there. There's something about all the chemicals in traditional products that freaks me out. On a referral from a friend I picked up Sunblocz to prepare for our upcoming ski weekends and winter desert getaway. I'm smitten. The product's smell is citrus-y and pleasant - so much better than the sunscreen-y smell we're all accustomed to. It covers nicely and rubs in well with not too much effort. I know that my fair hair (and skin) little ones are going to be well protected as we venture from the cloudy PacNW to the sunny slopes and harsh desert sun.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Petras

customer_reviews.title: This sunscreen worked like a charm on those sunny beach days and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought this with me on vacation for my baby and it was a life saver. I always have the fear of my children getting a sun burn, so I always make sure to invest in the right sunblock. This sunscreen worked like a charm on those sunny beach days and I love that it contains natural ingredients, making it safe for my baby's sensitive skin. It also repels bugs, so I didn't have to worry about both sunscreen and bug spray. The water resistance was great and can last up to 80 minutes! I highly recommend this for babies and young children.
customer_reviews.author: MetroMomClub

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this Sun block on my boys. It smells nice and not like a typical chemical smell of a sunscreen. I put this on our boys for both swimming and for a morning at the zoo and it kept there skin protected great. Our little one tends to rub his face a lot in the pool and we didn’t have any issues with him rubbing it into his eyes. Also, a little goes a long way and I think his tube will last us a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Liked the ingredients list. Found that I am allergic to this product, as it caused me to sting, blister and peel. Tried it three times before realizing it was this product causing the reaction. Adverse reaction to zinc oxide is rare, so I suspect one of the oils affected me. The product squeezed easily after kneading, and the white residue disappeared after 15 minutes. The limited ingredients are the best incentive to using this product. Sensitive skin needs a patch test.
customer_reviews.author: Katy 951

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT work. Caused worse burns
customer_reviews.text: This product was used multiple times to prevent burn over a two hour period. Was also in the shade, had hat on etc.... my son now has severe burns on face and arms everywhere it was applied. I am so upset and also reviewed many products to pick right one. This is NOT it. Dangerous! Also a pain to get out of tube and apply. It’s very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Diedre D. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunscreen for everyday
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews, compared to others. Have 8 and 4 year olds in South Florida. Use this daily for swim lessons, beach, playground, amusement parks, etc. Protects their skin. Not too thick, not watery. Washes off with a washcloth and soap at bath time. I’ve also applied it to help protect my 40+ year old skin.
customer_reviews.author: CVM

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, awesome smell, love this skin safe natural sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen has great coverage and doesn't feel too thick on the skin. I like having the white color stay on the skin to show what has been covered. I also really enjoyed the smell, almost like an essential oil, not like most other natural sunblocks that almost have an earthy smell. I have a daughter with severe eczema and was comfortable to use this product on her sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Scott&Wife

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Sunscreen for Our Young Children
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful that this product is high in Zinc Oxide, to safely protect our preschooler and baby from the sun year round, without having to worry about all the dangerous additives or fragrances found in many of the other sunscreen brands. This sunscreen rubs in easily and doesn't bother their skin at all. I also love that it is reef safe. We have seen so much reef damage everywhere we have traveled the past few years and it is so important for people to get reef safe sunscreen before going in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer!
customer_reviews.text: Great natural sunscreen. Great for sun sensitive prone kids who are allergic to the chemicals in "regular" sunscreens. A little expensive but the 4 oz size lasts quite a while. A travel size would also be nice that could be taken carry-on for an airplane flight.
customer_reviews.author: elleem

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, great smell, and a little bit goes a long way. Only reason 4 stars given is that it is a little hard to apply and it’s a little pricey(although I think the tube will last a long time). Easiest to apply to little faces and great coverage for the around the eye area that so easily burns. My kids would never sit still long enough for me to use on their whole bodies.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: pricey but my daughter has very sensitive skin so this is the first product she hasn't broke out in welts and rashes. also love the smell, think of essential oils and that's what it smells like...doesn't have the usual gross chemical smell of other sunblocks
customer_reviews.author: Joycelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for little bodies!
customer_reviews.text: Since having my daughter, it is important to me to find an all-natural sunscreen as I don't want strange chemicals absorbed into her body. She also shows signs of eczema occasionally so i wanted something easy on her skin. This sunscreen was perfect. I marked it down a star ONLY because it is very greasy on application, but it works like a charm. Added bonus - it's rated a 1 (best rating) by EWG!
customer_reviews.author: lboling

customer_reviews.title: Natural, safe and effective? Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have been using natural sunscreen for years. I figured they were all the same but I have now been proven wrong. I was so impressed by this sunscreen. It smells amazing and it doesn't leave my kids white as ghosts like most of the other mineral based sunscreens. It is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: NYMommy

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard, difficult to get out of tube and spread
customer_reviews.text: I should have tried sooner, too late to take back. I think it works okay, but it's so hard I barely use it. It take a lot of strength to squeeze - definitely not for kids, elderly, or arthritic. And difficult to spread given how thick.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Natural sunscreen the whole family can use.
customer_reviews.text: Sunscreen comes in a 4oz tube with SPF protection of 50. It’s waterproof and lasts 80 minutes. It’s white but goes on smoothly. Scent has a hint of rosemary. Best to knead tube before first use. Love that it’s all natural ingredients. The entire family can use it. Only negative is that is pricey for 4oz.
customer_reviews.author: StepOnMe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, smells great, and protected us well from the intense Arizona sun! I was also impressed that the bottle did not leak in my diaper bag, as often happens with these types of bottles.
customer_reviews.author: LindsinJapan

customer_reviews.title: A great natural sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love how smoothly this sunscreen goes on. No thick paste that leaves white marks all over. I also love the smell, it a pleasant essential oils scent. I'm glad a found a great natural sunscreen. Can't wait to use it more in the sunny days ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lynn B

customer_reviews.title: Love this sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I saw the high zinc oxide content and it was all natural. We are in the sun a lot and this sunscreen works great. It goes on a little thick but I was expecting that. Once it's rubbed in, you are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Our go-to sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This is our go to sunscreen for the family. I like that it uses non nano zinc oxide, lasts in water, has great ingredients, comes out of tube and applies nicely, has a high SPF but above all WORKS wonderfully. The tube is generous, a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Moyer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST sunscreen for the entire family!!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite sunscreen! Not greasy, not sticky, rubs in well, no odor, great for the entire family! Will definitely be using this during the summer! Definitely suggest trying this brand out!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Hard to spread but works
customer_reviews.text: It is very thick. As long as you apply as directed it works.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L.

customer_reviews.title: sunblock that has it all for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: love this sunbloack for my kids! it's all natural and hypoallergenic so it doesn't irritate my kids' sensitive skin. it is also water resistant so I don't have to worry about reapplying when they get in the pool. I asked my dermatologist about sunblock and he said it should include zinc oxide and that is the 1st ingredient listed on this product.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: all natural ingredients and NO parabens I feel good using this every day
customer_reviews.text: It may technically be Fall but we're still spending our afternoons outside in the warm sunshine. I'm so thankful for Sunblocz for keeping my girl safe and sunburn free. With the highest amount of zinc oxide, all natural ingredients and NO parabens I feel good using this every day!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Really difficult to blend into the skin and the product itself separates...
customer_reviews.author: Nav J

customer_reviews.title: I love this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen! It's easy to rub in and doesn't leave a chalky residue. Most of all, I love that it's natural! I can use it on the whole family and don't have to worry!
customer_reviews.author: Bokhyun Yoo

customer_reviews.title: Our new go-to
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on smoothly and isn't greasy. I love that it's all natural. I love how it smell! It also doesn't look really chalky like some sunscreens we have used.
customer_reviews.author: flans3

customer_reviews.title: Leaves so much white cast
customer_reviews.text: It's great that it's an all natural sunscreen, but it leaves the skin looking zombie-like white.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love that it's 100% natural
customer_reviews.text: As a family with two little ones we adore this new sunscreen! We love that it's 100% natural, goes on white and dries clear, and lasts long. Bonus, a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy this goes on and that I trust all of the ingredients on my toddler’s skin
customer_reviews.author: Jen Suresh

customer_reviews.title: i like that the amount of zinc oxide in it is ...
customer_reviews.text: gave my brown skin a really white cast. however, i like that the amount of zinc oxide in it is high.
customer_reviews.author: seaurchin

customer_reviews.title: Must have for mommas!
customer_reviews.text: Love this safe sunblock for babies! It is easy to rub on and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: monigmp03

customer_reviews.title: but it smells terrible! It is also incredibly difficult to rub in ...
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to use it in the sun, but it smells terrible! It is also incredibly difficult to rub in and was left with a white cast to my skin. It sits on your skin (as sunblock should), but it FEELS like it is sitting on your skin. Not emollient at all. Very waxy feeling. It feel gross on your body. Absolutely NOT a fan .
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smoothly and baby didn’t have a reaction! Loved so much I bought others for friends with babies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: All Natural, High Quality, Smells Great and High UV Spectrum Blockage
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this is all natural. It smells great too! I'd feel confident using this product on my children. It works well. I haven't been able to test that it's waterproof considering the season. A little goes a long way and it is a little bit thicker so you don't need as much. It takes a little while longer to rub in. I like that I can wear it under my make up and use on my kid!
customer_reviews.author: Cher

product_meta.title: Sunblocz Baby + Kids Sunscreen, SPF 50, Natural Mineral Zinc Oxide Sunblock, Broad Spectrum, Waterproof, Reef Safe 4 oz
feature_bullets: NO HARMFUL CHEMICALS: Our super organic formula gives your baby strong protection for a long time. The ingredients used does not contain any biologically harmful chemicals like phthalates, 1,4 dioxane, PABA, paraben, oxybenzone, avobenzone.
100% NATURAL MINERAL SUNSCREEN WITH 24.5% ZINC OXIDE: Our baby & kid's sunscreen contains the highest percent of non-nano zinc oxide possible, plus antioxidant-rich ingredients such as grapeseed oil.
SPF 50 + WATER RESISTANT FOR 80 MIN: Our broad-spectrum zinc sunblock shields skin from both UVA and UVB rays. Once applied, Sunblocz is water resistant for 80 minutes - a great choice for on-the-go!
PERFUME FREE: Sunblocz baby & kids sunscreen formula does not have any added fragrance. The mild formula protects and soothes your baby’s skin. Give your baby the best care this summer.
FORMULATED WITH 50+SPF: Broad-Spectrum sun protection formula, made without oxybenzone, parabens. Our sunscreen contains no added fragrance. A truly broad-spectrum formula that covers UVA & UVB rays.
